DOC.brief_summary: Interest of a reirradiation with concomitant chemotherapy after salvage surgery for recurrence of head and cancer in irradiated area : a multicentric Phase III randomized trial
DOC.brief_title: Reirradiation With Concomitant Chemotherapy After Salvage Surgery for Recurrence of Head and Neck Cancer in Irradiated Area
DOC.criteria: head and neck squamous cancer both sexes >=18 years recurrence treated by surgery and initially treated by radiotherapy with written informed consent at entry time
